main event: A commercial pilot observed flying discs in Lima, Peru on 5 Aug 52.
interesting points: The flying discs were described as transparent and shiny objects., The discs maneuvered at high speed for about 15-20 seconds., At 30,000 feet, one object was illuminated for a while before disappearing., Witnesses had reported similar objects in Lima the previous day., The conclusion was that the objects were probably balloons.
